name: Easy Patrick Crossword - Best Green Nonogram
name_original: Easy Patrick Crossword - Best Green Nonogram
description:
Green Day to all of you!

Well, St. Patrick’s Day is not that kind of holiday when people make presents to each other. But we decided to please our gamers!

Everything must be green this day and our nonogram is not an exception.

So that’s our second small present - easy version of Patrick Crossword! The hidden pictures are made in beautiful green color…actually, everything there is green!
As usual design is simple and there is a 3D mode at your disposal. And second (and main) present is new difficult levels!
According to your requests we have made more difficult levels for you. All boards begins from 10x10 cells. For people who like to train their brain, memory and attention it will be a good opportunity to test his skills.
All pictures are relates to the holiday or green color. So you have no chances to get bored!

Features:
- Free;
- 3D;
- Simple menu context;
- Holiday green design;
- Zoom
- 30 levels;

We wish you luck and happiness! Enjoy the game!
